solution_line_template: Kelsey turned {kelsey_age_1999} in {year_kelsey_turned_25} so she was born in {year_kelsey_turned_25}-{kelsey_age_1999} = <<{kelsey_birth_year}={kelsey_birth_year}>>{kelsey_birth_year}

Kelsey's sister is older by {sister_older_by_years} years so she was born in {kelsey_birth_year}-{sister_older_by_years} = <<{kelsey_birth_year}-{sister_older_by_years}={sister_birth_year}>>{sister_birth_year}

It's currently {current_year} and Kelsey's sister was born in {sister_birth_year} so she is {current_year}-{sister_birth_year} = <<{current_year}-{sister_birth_year}={sister_current_age}>>{sister_current_age} years old
